review_text: We had a great time here, beautiful house amazing location. The outdoor was awesome and the jacuzzi was a fun way to start the day in the mornings. Would stay again

Davi's Place in West Hollywood is a gem! The place is stylishly decorated and impeccably clean. Davi is an exceptional host, providing prompt communication and valuable local tips. The location is unbeatable, offering both tranquility and easy access to Sunset Boulevard. The hot tub was awesome, we loved soaking in the hot tub. I highly recommend Davi's Place for a memorable stay in West Hollywood.

Very beautiful. Well worth the trip. The cabin was nice and cozy and the views are fantastic. The space was nice and clean and very comfortable. The one thing I wished was that the internet was useable, as the speeds were such that it was practically unresponsive. However, everything else about the space was amazing. Highly recommend.
Great place! Thank you
Amazing place! So unique and such a lovely helpful host. Would 100000% recommend, a must do for any LA visit!

This was such an amazing unique experience. My bf and I had such a blast. Heidi is so sweet and makes you feel right at home. The outside shower is relaxing. The view is incredible. The doggies would greet us every morning. Would recommend!
Loved it! Especially the outdoor showers.
Heidi was so welcoming and wonderful and her location was absolutely gorgeous. 100/10 recommend and will be revisiting over and over again ❤️

This accommodation is magical, you are in the middle of nature.
Wake up in the morning with the sun and take a few deep breaths on your terrace.
I could go on and on about this place.
Heidi is a wonderful person and a great host.
The best thing to do is book one of Heidi's great accommodations, then you'll know what I mean. ;)

The bubble house is totally unique. It is perched at the top of a hill accessed by rustic wooden stairs. This is not a place for someone looking for extreme luxury. The shower is outdoors, the hike up the drive is not easy, the lav is enclosed and adjacent. This is a place for people looking to get back to nature and experience the beauty of Topanga. The bed is situated in a bay window with great views. The shower has plenty of hot water. The location is ideal for visiting the town or venturing out to Malibu and the the beach. Heidi was awesome and her dogs are super friendly. Loved the stay.
nice views & super cozy. we loved the dogs & the pigs. heidi was also super nice.
Peeps Bubble was incredible. A bit of a climb to get to the cabin but doable. Heidi was incredible. Invited us into her home and we met all the sweet pups. If we are ever here again we will return!
heidis place was an oasis of piece and we loved out little hideaway in topanga! would love to come back! and the dogs were so lovely, a big plus!

Enjoyed my stay at Heidi’s place in Topanga canyon! Definitely a cool funky property she has. I really enjoyed my stay however, do think it works best for a certain type of guest! It definitely was a bit more on the rustic side of the lodging spectrum and especially with the colder weather we were experiencing in the canyon, ran a bit on the chillier side!
I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun stay in with a beautiful view - just know that it is giving more camping cabin energy than traditional apt or cottage.
Thanks Heidi for the stay!

I wish I never left! It is as peaceful and special as the pictures convey. The outdoor shower was super refreshing, and the pups are a wonderful, welcomed addition. Heidi is such a friendly, warm person, and I am so grateful she opened up her space for people to experience solitude! I was a solo female traveler and felt safe and at home. Also LOVE the town of Topanga, I had plans to explore far and wide but barely left the area.
Magical little getaway spot!

Perfect place to disconnect from the busy life. Fresh air, beautiful sunset. The animals are adorable! When they greet me outside the cabin made me feel like a Disney princess. Heidi's instructions were super clear, I didn't have to ask for anything else. I had a perfect getaway trip:)
Heidi was present but also gave you privacy and was attentive and welcoming I would definitely stay here again !
Such a magical retreat! Will definitely be back. Very clean & serene.

Very artistic property in Topanga Hippie style! As a songwriter, the space provided interesting art and natural surroundings, providing the perfect backdrop for creating. Thank you Heidi, for the retreat and conversation! ❤️

Fantastic stay— perfect for my solo nature retreat! Location feels like miles from civilization even though you’re just 20 minutes away from Calabasas. The place is a magical treehouse— a little glamping, a little cozy cottage. I enjoyed the outdoor shower and had no problems with the open, communal vibe. Everyone I met who was also staying on property was very friendly. Tons of hiking and outdoor exploration nearby. Internet was sparse, I went to town for a reliable internet connection. I felt very safe and comfortable. Heidi has created a unique and special corner in Topanga— definitely will be back again!
Heidi is a wonderful host and a great person to have a chat with. She’s a wealth of creativity and has built a really unique space in a town full of similarly unique people and breathtaking views.
Everything I was hoping it would be + dog and pig friends made it a memorable little trip! Definitely would visit again
Lovely peaceful place with lots of character!

Loved my solo getaway for a night in the treehouse. Heidi’s space is so cozy and comforting, and I enjoyed reading though the cute vintage children’s book “I like you.”
I am always looking for unique places to stay, and this is truly one of a kind… rustic but comfortable, cozy with proper plumbing and hot water, and views that are breathtaking.
There are some great hikes and restaurants 15 min away, so the location is great if you have a car but still want to feel remote.
It rained all night while I was there, which encouraged getting comfortable in the provided robe, reading a book, and enjoying the sounds of frogs and rain on the roof. It’s a special property and I’d certainly like to return in the future.
Heidi’s cabin was absolutely dreamy and the property was gorgeous. It felt completely private. It was very clean and decorated so well. Worth the price, we would definitely book again.

Heidi’s place was absolutely wonderful - we could feel the warmth of her energy throughout the entire space. And Heidi herself met with us several times, introduced us to her amazing puppies (I’m very scared of dogs but I think a huge part of it healed through this trip). I wish we could have more time there! It just felt so great to be away from the city and be reminded of how beautiful and simple life is. Will never forget this experience!
Wonderful stay in Heidi's cabin. Perfect for a peaceful weekend away!

If you’re looking to disconnect and just enjoy the beautiful nature of topanga then this is the place for you. Just be careful not to pack a big bag because the driveway/ hill is steep so be logical. I’d say check in before sun down so you can see the entrance area clearly. Heidi was so sweet and saw I was struggling because it was dark and rainy (my luck) and walked me to my room herself. What a lovely person. The bed is so comfortable and she offered a heater and the plushest blanket and bath robes. I’d say bring tea bags, snacks and coffee with you!
I want to thank Heidi first and foremost. Your property is so much more than I could have imagined. It was a perfect get away.

I loved staying at Heidi's hideaway in Topanga. It was peaceful, magical, and just what I needed. Heidi was so gracious and I enjoyed chatting with her and meeting her family. Her dogs were so friendly too.. don't be surprised if one of them adopts you! Will definitely return :)

Heidi was a lovely host! We enjoyed staying at her magical getaway. The decor was eclectic and had its own vibe. We loved looking at the stars through the window bed, and the outdoor shower was pure magic. Bed was so comfortable! She was a very proactive host and made sure we felt welcome.

Amazing NYE staycation in Topanga thanks to Heidi’s treehouse paradise. The surrounding canyon views are breathtaking, we loved walking around outside feeling like we were at a camp or retreat. The pups were so sweet (I must admit Eloise was my favorite) and of course the pig! We crossed paths with Heidi and her family over the weekend and that made the stay even more special. Such a wholesome and friendly vibe on the property. Everyone made sure we enjoyed our stay and always had a smile to share. Check out Cafe on 27 and Endless Color Pizza if you get a chance! Thanks for everything, Heidi & family ♥️
Heidi is a friendly, responsible and proactive person. We enjoyed staying her property with her family, beautiful dogs and also a pig! Liked the Tarzan shower at night most.

This spot was super magical! Loved having our own space, but folks in the other cabins on the property were so welcoming and made us feel right at home. Cute, rustic, a perfect place to be close to LA but feel at peace!

Heidi is a dream host !
The cabin is so cozy , the view is breathtaking.
The bed is very comfortable , woke up feeling like I was in a nest in the trees .
Thank you for such an amazing stay and welcome !
If you’re looking for a creative, art-infused, cozy cabin — that maybe has a bit of magic swirling around inside — this is the place. I loved my stay here so very much. Thank you Heidi!
We loved the place! It was a fantastic stay. Definitely good for our souls.
The house is very nice
Heidi’s cabin was very cute and just what we were looking for! The perfect getaway close to LA
I absolutely enjoyed my stay, heidi was very positive and very helpful. Her dogs are so cute and very friendly! 🥺I will be back for another get away! Thank you heidi well wishes ☮️
Had an amazing time here, such a nurturing place. Especially loved waking up to the animals. Heidi is awesome! Would def come back here some other time.

We had an amazing stay, feeling at home and cozy right away. You have everything you need, it’s a rustic cabin but very comfortable and clean.
The view was beautiful, lots of hikes around, groceries and restaurants just 10min away.

We had a lovely time staying here. The place is full of so much character and love and became the perfect place to retreat back to after a day of exploring LA. Nestled in amongst the Santa Monica mountains Heidi’s place is perfectly placed to watch the stars at night and take in all the nature by day. Unfortunately we didn’t get to meet Heidi but we did have the pleasure of meeting her assistant Gabi and also her Son, Noble. Who were both super helpful during our stay. The real all stars are the lovely dogs and little pig who rock around the ranch. They will welcome you in and say goodbye. My favourite was Elouise. It would be lovely to stay here again in the future.
The Mountain Bubble was perfect for a getaway to a beautiful place!

Heidi’s Bubble was so beautiful words cannot describe the peace I felt. I loved every minute I spent on her property. I even cried on the last day. Coming from a city life to one so still was powerful. The town was so cute. I recommend the water lilly cafe for your morning yummyness. Also cute shops all around. I would LOVE to come back to topanga especially to Heidi’s every chance I get. She was so great! She feels like you’re staying at a family members house. Her doggos and piggy were the cherry on top. Thank you for this beautiful experience 💗
Incredibly beautiful place!!! Heidi was so super kind!!! This was such an amazing stay thank you

Loved staying here! So unique and serene. The outdoor shower overlooking the mountains was stunning and the room itself was perfect for my long weekend stay. Heidi was very responsive and her dogs were so cute! Only things I wish I had known before booking is that the lock is a hook lock, not a proper lock and key. I didn’t have any issues but made me a little nervous knowing someone can just unlatch it from the outside and walk into your space. Also, there were other Airbnb guests on the property (in separate cabins) which wasn’t an issue for me but just something to know before booking. Overall would definitely recommend and would love to come back!
Heidi was very welcoming and helpful but the place does require a lot of work for safety and privacy.
A gorgeous spot for a relaxing, unplugged experience, with delightful shops and restaurants a short drive away.
Perfect.
Wonderful Experience. Would definitely come back and visit again.
We enjoyed our stay in Topanga! A super unique airbnb with fun critters and great views. :)

After I was greeted with a standing ovation from the dogos in the boathouse and a warm hug I knew I was in for a treet!! This place is nothing short of magical, especially the mountain bed!!! And the shower in the olive tree blew my mind every time!!! Magic pure magic✨
Heidi’s home is beautiful. You can step outside and feel like you’re camping. She also has the sweetest dogs and other furry family members. Thank you!
Such a perfect, cozy stay!! A wonderful way to get away from busy life, and feel comfortable in a space that is not your home, but feels like it could be!

The place was lovely, just as advertised. It was cozy, modern, and clean. I enjoyed my stay. The cabin was up in the mountains but close enough to several nice restaurants and cafes. I would like to maybe go back again sometime when the weather is cooler.

Heidi's "Beep Bubble" cabin was a great two-night stay in the canyon. We loved the privacy, fun outdoor shower, and most of all, her potbelly pig Dot and all of Dots friends! Thank you Heidi for welcoming us into your home and sharing your beautiful property with us!

Wow, this stay was just extraordinary! The landscape is just amazing, Heidi was a very oblinging host, who gave me great recommendations regarding things to see in the area. I really loved staying in the mountain bubble and enjoying the quite nature arround and chill with the dogs at the evenings. This experience is broadening the mind of everyone that visits this magical place.

Staying here is more than just an Airbnb - it's got a very special energy to it that transports you. It's one of a kind and I will continue coming back. Make sure to connect with Heidi and get some life wisdom from her.

Wow, what a find! Simply put, this a magical little corner of the world that I hope more are lucky enough to find. Heidi is friendly, artistic and energetic. My wife and I were lucky enough to meet Heidi and her new pet pig! From the friendly animals, the beautiful views and the unique artistic touch to everything behind the walls of Heidi's property you will leave this air bnb but it will never leave your mind. We will be back, if you are reading this you should book it now. Thanks Heidi!!!! Please give the pig kisses for us. :-)

Beeps mountain bubble was the scene of my first night in California from uk and it was a magical experience I'll never forget. Such a cool room and the outdoor shower is dope. All the amenities were well cleaned and taken care of. The canyon was so peaceful and beautiful and it felt like we had the whole valley to ourselves, stargazing most of the night on the wonderful outdoor bed gave us a chance to connect with Mother Nature. It felt like such a magical adventure so thank you Heidi for providing such an awesome space. We'd love to come back one day and stay longer for sure.
We truly had an amazing time. One of the most unique places we have ever stayed!
Heidi is awesome and a great host! The spot is so cool and cute and unique. Will definitely be staying here again.

What a delightful retreat! Thanks so much Heidi for the wonderful hospitality. Loved the views from Beeps Bubble, marvelous to have my tea out on the little porch outside, and awesome being so close to great hikes, beaches and restaurants. What a gem! Can’t wait to come back 😊
We had a lovely time. Helpful, friendly and made us feel welcome.
Was a beautiful hideaway from the city-Amazing host, beautiful location and spot! Perfect for a peaceful getaway:)
awesome stay! beautiful space, u can tell she puts a lot of attention to detail in the stay. would recommend for anyone wanting to stay in topanga!

Heidi was such a friendly and warm host. Our stay at the Beep's Bubble was a peaceful and quiet, yet adventurous experience. The views of mountains from the cozy cabin windows were lovely, getting to shower outdoors (what Heidi calls a Tarzan shower) was insanely refreshing with the cool night breeze, and being among the pets was so much fun. A number of her sweet dogs came up to our cabin to greet us. The style is quirky yet elegant, kinda like we were in an Anthropologie shop but a cabin. :)
Super comfortable & accommodating.

Heidi's place is totally magical. We had a wonderful time at her cabin, which is incredibly unique, cozy, comfortable - and the views! Wow - pretty spectacular. The cabin has everything you need, the outdoor shower was a dream, and the deck is a lovely spot to relax and enjoy the views. Her property is filled with all kinds of amazing art, thoughtful touches, cool structures and really blends into the natural surroundings. The town of Topanga is close by, with great food and shops. Heidi was friendly, responsive and all around a great host. We didn't want to leave - and we can't wait to come back and visit again!
I loved my stay! Decided to do celebrate my 25th in pure solitude away from it all and in the hills! Heidi was very responsive and super accommodating!

Absolutely amazing experience staying at Heidi’s place.
Grounding and nourishing.
Very grateful.
Would return in a heartbeat.

Heidi's place is magical. It's something quite special. We finished a longer trip with Heidi and had stayed in many places before we got to her. But no place was as special as this. It's beautiful in a whole special way. Clean avant-garde.
In addition, the views, the tranquility and Heidi's hospitality which was outstanding.
I traveled with my teenager and neither of us will forget about this place. It's made an impression! ❤️

Beep’s bubble is a magical little spot. Honestly, I wanted to lounge in the heavenly bed all day. So comfortable and surrounded by the huge windows with gorgeous views. I was truly tucked into a fairy tale energy.
I felt very peaceful and relaxed on her property and at my place. The perfect place for me to unwind and come to stillness again after a few weeks of nonstop movement.

Heidi’s place is a home away from home , elegantly and effortlessly designed by her , you feel in nature tucked away , comfortable , no cares with beautiful views , mountain air , drinking your French press coffee, without all the stress of traveling far. Topanga is truly a hidden gem in LA and Heidi’s place is a gem within that gem. The interiors are filled with hand picked art that will delight you. This is a place you should repeatedly frequent because it’s an experience without pretending to be .

Heidi is an incredible dynamic person with a unique, breathtaking property. This experience was unlike any of my previous stays elsewhere. The cabin I stayed in was perfect and cozy with views of the beautiful trees and mountains. If you’re looking for an ideal Topanga stay full of nature, art, and wonder, look no further! Heidi was so generous, communicative and enjoyable to connect with. She took care of my every need. Thank you for making my stay so memorable!
The place is very romantic, the views from the unit are beautiful, and the host's son Noble was very helpful. it was an amazing, relaxed, romantic experience.
Best Airbnb ever!

Heidi's place is fantastic! It's set in a beautiful, pristine area near Topanga...the scenery/views are breathtaking.
Upon arrival, Heidi greeted me and took me on a quick tour. It was wonderful getting to know a bit of the history of her place and of the surrounding area. Heidi's artistic background and energy can be seen and felt around every corner of this eclectic hideaway.
The cabin I stayed in was adorable. It was cozy, and had so many windows I felt as though I was outdoors the entire time. Looking out at Big Rock from the outdoor shower is one of my favorite take-aways... Thank you, Heidi. I'll definitely be back.
Such a great lil cabin! The views were incredible and even though the main house is right next door, there was still a ton of privacy. Would love to visit again :)

Such a beautiful place! Finding it is a little tough as the driveway really is hidden but there are detailed instructions that do help :) The cabin is incredibly cute with insane views. The tub was amazing as well. 10/10 worth!

We were blown away by the views and the peaceful nature of this getaway. It was great to have some time to disconnect and the cabin was a beautiful way to be able to do that. Highly recommend a stay at this cabin!
Fascinating spot in the Topanga Canyon. We really enjoyed our stay, which we won’t soon forget.
This place was great, my sister and I went for a few days away, and the views and hot tub were amazing! Very peaceful and beautiful, and great place to unwind.

I have been to many airbnbs around the world and this one by far has been one of my favorites. Beautiful, peaceful surroundings. Quiet solitude. The hot tub was incredible. I would love to stay here again.

We enjoyed our time here so much! Very cozy, peaceful, and beautiful space/surroundings. Hosts are lovely, cedar hot tub is incredible, and it’s super convenient to exploring Topanga. Cant wait to stay here again in the future!
This was a great tranquil and relaxing Airbnb. Definitely a unique experience to reconnect with nature and disconnect with the everyday routine.
Great experience!

This is a beautiful spot up in the mountains of Topanga. Looks just like the pictures. The hosts were friendly & receptive, checkin/checkout was easy, and overall I’d highly recommend staying here if you’re looking for a peaceful, quiet stay outside of the city

We had an amazing stay. Everything was beautiful and clean, and we appreciated the minimal decor so nothing distracted from the view. The hot tub was perfect. We were surprised how comfortable we were even with our kids travel crib in the room with us. We would absolutely come again!

We had an amazing weekend staying at Amelia's tiny home. Even more beautiful than the pictures. The hot tub was so therapeutic. The view was stunning. I loved the outdoor shower as well. Can't wait to return!
Beautiful spot in Topanga mountains.
Beautiful place with a beautiful surrounding. Definitely would love to stay again.
AMAZING!! So so worth a getaway out of the city! We can’t wait to be back! Thank you!!

This cabin is the ultimate oasis in Topanga. A little slice of heaven tucked away in the hillside. Listing is just as pictured with great amenities and comforts. Host is super responsive and helpful. Would love to comeback in the future.
Gorgeous and well located, I would definitely visit again.

Absolutely loved our one-night stay at this charming Airbnb! The place is super cute, efficient, and impeccably clean, with an amazing view to top it off. Celebrated my 40th birthday here, and it was truly memorable. The hosts were incredibly sweet and responsive, making our experience even more delightful.
Highly recommend trying their breakfast – it's worth it!
The only suggestion for improvement would be to add a few shelves on top of the bed headboard for a bit more space, but honestly, that's just a minor detail in an otherwise perfect stay. Would definitely return and recommend to others without hesitation!

We had such an amazing stay! The space looks exactly like the photos but even better. Amelia & Ian were very responsive and accommodating. The cabin was private and serene. We hope we will be able to stay again sometime soon. Thank you both so much! 💗

Great location with nice view
Nature metaverse

such a unique place to stay in LA and felt like a real retreat w the long drive up the canyon! relaxing in the hot tub with amazing views was the perfect way to end each day. thank you for a nice visit!

This cabin is literally perfection. My parter and I came for a romantic escape and the cedar hot tub is phenomenal, the cabin looks exactly as pictured, and watching dawn break through the giant window is the most beautiful way to wake up. Book this place if you can!
We truly enjoyed our stay!
Such a relaxing home with amazing views. The build itself is immaculate. I’ll be dreaming of that hot tub. Great getaway from the city but not too far.

Incredibly grateful that we discovered this special spot! Only 1 hour from our home but would be willing to do a day long journey for a place like this!
5 star cabin experience. Perfect airbnb if you love nature but value comfort. Never had a better view while taking a shower or sitting in a hot tub!
Continental breakfast add on was fabulous.
Amelia was friendly and super helpful.
Had a lovely stay. Would come back!

So many amazing details that made this stay so memorable. Amelia really thought of everything. The shower, bed, the cabin, the views, the tub. Everything was so easy and luxurious yet peaceful and serene and comfortable. Would love to come back. Five stars without a doubt.
One of my favorite Airbnb stays ever! Attention to detail, beautiful property and an all around great place to be.
Unbelievable. Just a true gem in Topanga. A must if you are looking for a getaway.
Great stay beautiful location. Open yet private.

This airbnb was the perfect getaway for my boyfriend and I for the weekend. We wanted a romantic spot away from the city but still accessible to LA and this place was great. We were able to go out to dinner in LA and then come back to this unique + special place in the evening.
Soaking in the hot tub in the morning and evening was a huge plus! The cabin is beautifully designed and it was so nice to look out at the gorgeous Topanga views.
If you’re looking for a special place to have a relaxing getaway, this is your spot!

So cute and sweet - great little place
Topanga Canyon is very sweet and lovely to spend some time browsing around. Gorgeous homes nestled amongst the trees and staying at Ian and Amelia’s place gives you a magical little taste of living in the glorious California canyon air. Very comfortable bed - amazing view and delightful aroma wood hot tub = bliss ! Great drive down to Malibu. There is a lovely porch space for hanging out stargazing as well. Delightful little cabin.

This was my favorite air bnb experience by far. I stayed here for a night and the space was so cozy, the view is breathtaking, and the amenities and details of the room were so perfect! It was so easy to find, even as i drove in the evening. The perfect staycation in nature! Thank you so much for sharing the most beautiful sanctuary!
The best place for a quiet get away! Loved the outdoor features and the hot tub was divine. Would definitely come back and stay longer✨
I fell in love with this Airbnb! Unfortunately, I wasn't able to stay very long but my stay was amazing! Highly recommend!
The View was Breathtaking. Hot tub was very Relaxing and therapeutic. Will definitely stay again. Amelia & Ian were great Hosts
Such a lovely and peaceful stay!!
You won’t regret it.

This is a truly wonderful place, we had three nights there hated to leave. It’s immaculate, simple,
beautiful, serene, we heard many species of birds every morning, had coffee in the hot tub every day, and felt so cozy in the cabin every night. Great coffee and breakfast place at the foot of the hill. Topanga is the best part about LA. And only 20 minutes from the city. We can’t wait to come back here and will stay here every time we visit LA.

Amazing and unique air bnb stay! Amelia and Ian and Wizard made us feel right at home. The breathtaking views from the property and hot tub made for relaxing nights!! Close to lots of great spots, yet remote enough for a quaint getaway! 10/10 would recommend!

Perfect for an escape. Relaxing and clean.
And Amelia was great! And responsive
Will be back for sure..
Great place. Excellent host

This is the most AMAZING place for a wonderful and romantic getaway! My wife and I adored our stay!
The room was beautifully curated and furnished, extremely cleanly inside and out! The amenities were amazing and the view was unbeatable! Vast and sweeping views of the incredible mountains and canyon, while still feeling extremely private and intimate.
If there was one place with room for improvement, it would be an upgrade to the quality of the mattress and pillows, but for the experience and view, it is beyond worth it!

Amelia & Ian were wonderful hosts! They were incredibly warm and responsive. Their cabin in the woods is so cozy and peaceful - we really enjoyed our stay. The hot tub and outdoor shower were such nice touches. 100% would recommend.
Magical and unforgettable! We loved our stay. Would love to book again.
We had a lovely stay! Thank you so much again. Very responsive and great experience
Amazing view, cozy room, unique and relaxing stay.

We had such a peaceful stay in Topanga. The property is in a beautiful, secluded location in Topanga with stunning views and a sleek design. The space is cozy and clean and blends in nicely with the natural surroundings. The hot tub was perfect for relaxing in after hiking in the Santa Monica Mountains and exploring the Malibu Coast and the outdoor shower is awesome. We're really grateful to the hosts for sharing this incredible space and we would love to return asap!
This place is aesthetically so pleasing and an absolute dream to stay at.

i absolutely loved it. i went
for a little private getaway and i couldn’t ask for more. the view was amazing. felt right at home. the host were amazing and would love to book again.

We had such a peaceful stay at cabin on the rocks! The simple space was well designed with thoughtful details throughout. It had everything we needed for a nature-focused and tranquil getaway. The hot tub is such a treat, and feels incredibly private and spa-like. Amelia and Ian were extremely proactive and responsive. We highly recommend!
This place was so lovely! The hot tub was the loveliest hot tub I’ve ever been in
This house was thoughtfully designed and built beautifully. We really enjoyed the hot tub. Amelia was a great host. I would recommend staying here for a quiet getaway.
Beautiful and peaceful, highly recommend.

This place was an absolute DREAM!! Insane views and even better than the photos. The hot tub was so nice and the most relaxed I’ve felt in a longtime. Hosts were also super sweet and accommodating. I highly recommend this gorgeous place and would be back.

This place is magical! The hosts are amazing! A lot of thought, care and love went into the setup of this extraordinary space. Helped celebrate someone's 40'th and this phenomenal spot was just perfect. ❤🙏

You will feel absolutely hosted at Amelia's cabin, and this place is an absolute GEM. I needed a quiet place to stay for a meeting in the city, and this place was it - a peaceful, modern, and unique getaway. Amelia had everything prepared for our arrival, she even had the hot tub temperature ready! The location is in the mountains of Topanga, and the cabin was easy to find, parking is well marked and the cabin is designed to maximize all of the peaceful nature around it. It is literally built into/on the landscape as pictured, immaculate and modern, you will think you've been swooped away to scandanavia. There is a view overlooking the canyon, the hot tub is literally steps away from the cabin. The shower runs excellent hot and cold water, all amenities are delightfully well placed within the cabin itself. There is a coffeemaker, plugs for phone charger, outlets, classy sheets and a comfortable bed, matching robes, this is a category of glamping of its own...pure luxury.
We absolutely loved our stay here, would highly recommend
This place was a 10/10. We had such relaxing time and it was such a peaceful stay. So many friends reached out to ask for the link! We will absolutely be back!

One of the most beautiful airbnbs I have ever stayed at. Amelia and ever husband are so accommodating. I felt like I was living in a fantasy world everyday. breakfast, jacuzzi and the tastiest water from the outdoor sink will definitely be missed.

It is amazing to be in gorgeous nature being so close to Malibu, Santa Monica and LA. The perfect spot to relax after the hustle.
The cabin is a magical place. Thank you for sharing, Amelia and Ian!
Such a cool and unique spot. Simple and all you need. Stunning view and very private. Hot tub is excellent. Always love an outdoor shower. Would def recommend!

The cabin is an architectural dream, the giant glass window looking out over the canyon was so special. Everything we needed for our stay was supplied. Excellent communication from the hosts and flexible and accommodating to our needs. Cosy, but also felt spacious due to the design, had everything we needed & wasn’t cluttered. Bed was really comfy, slept so well in the peace and quiet…breathtaking views, the outdoor shower was spiritual experience and with the cedar hot tub and beautiful rock formations it felt like a private spa retreat! best place we stayed on our roadtrip so far 😊

The most spectacular Airbnb on the planet!!!!! An architectural delight and design masterpiece. This little Finnish cabin with a view to soothe your soul is like nowhere I’ve ever stayed before. It was perfect!!!! No detail was left undone, the bed was beyond comfortable and the wooden hot tub like a 1970’s Big Sur dream. I absolutely loooved this stay and cannot recommend it enough. Airbnb should feature this property, it is that Amazing!!!!!

I whisked my girlfriend away to Amelia and Ian's little Airbnb for her birthday (2 nights). We had an amazing time and felt very at peace in the Topanga hills, this place is truly something special (better than pictures).
